Traditional healers/ herbal doctors  
Traditional community healers can provide information related to using home remedies and medicinal plants for minor ailments as well as health promotion. As they are respected by community people, if properly informed, they can play an important role in advocating with people on health promotion and disease 
prevention.
Youth Groups
A youth group is usually a group of young people who meet and enjoy activities 
such as sports, music, videos and spend time talking about various issues. Many 

153
youth clubs are set up to provide young people with a personal and social 
space with activities designed to keep them off the streets, and giving them the 
opportunity to engage in meaningful and constructive activities. 
Youth groups can be important peer educators. They can be good advocates for 
promoting health promoting behaviours like eating nutritious diet, exercising
